dl.dd: Located on the Brickyard Road, 3 km ( 2mi.) east of Albert Bridge. The park is 22 km (14 mi.) south of Sydney on Route 22.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: The park has 180 woodland and open campsites, including 15 two-way hookups with electric and water. The park has a picnic area, a boat launch, and a trailer dump station. The large unsupervised beach is ideal for families to play.
WiFi is available at the admin building only and the surrounding area. There will be a password needed, please see the park receptionists.
